name: Yoga
desc: Yoga is a mind and body practice. Various styles of yoga combine physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation or relaxation.

name: Weight Loss
desc: Weight loss can have causes that are not due to underlying disease.

name: Crossfit
desc: CrossFit is a branded fitness regimen created by Greg Glassman..

name: Karate
desc: Karate is a martial art developed in the Ryukyu Kingdom.

name: Running
desc: Running is a method of terrestrial locomotion allowing humans and other animals to move rapidly on foot.

name: Personal Training
desc: Personal trainers work with clients to develop and implement fitness training regimens that help achieve goals
